p: For the fumigation of the EO under the two different conditions, room temperature 20°C and cold temperature 4°C, the changes in A. flavus colony number on the surface of platycladi semen are shown in Figure 3C. It can be seen that the growth of A. flavus on the surface of platycladi semen under cold storage conditions was inhibited relative to that under room temperature conditions, so fumigation with EO under cold storage conditions is more effective.
